meanings.definition: A unit of volume equal to 1,000 liters.
meanings.sent1: The swimming pool holds several kilolitres of water.
meanings.sent2: The factory used ten kilolitres of oil for production.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled a kilolitres of juice on the floor!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a kilolitres of joy.
meanings.sent5: The truck carried kilolitres of sand for the construction site.

meanings.sent1: The tanker truck delivered kilolitres of milk to the dairy.
meanings.sent2: The storage tank can hold up to twenty kilolitres of fuel.
meanings.sent3: He poured a kilolitres of soda into the giant cup.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like kilolitres of liquid diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed with kilolitres of rainwater after the storm.
